text: Barry Nathaniel Malzberg (July 24, 1939 - December 19, 2024) was an American science fiction writer and editor. His best known works were The Falling Astronauts, Beyond Apollo, In the Stone House and Final War. Malzberg died at his home in Saddle River, New Jersey on December 19, 2024 from problems caused by pneumonia, aged 85., Dignity Memorial, Accessed December 20, 2024. ==References== ==Other websites== *Interview about Malzberg's Lone Wolf series of novels * * Category:1939 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:American science fiction writers Category:American editors Category:Writers from New York City Category:People from Teaneck, New Jersey Category:Writers from New Jersey
